summary: This is a memorandum from the Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General (OIG) documenting a voluntary interview conducted on August 5, 2021, with a Senior Officer from the Federal Bureau of Prisons (BOP) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York. The interview is part of an official OIG investigation into the death of inmate Jeffrey Epstein, who was found unresponsive in his cell on August 10, 2019. The officer was assigned to the Special Housing Unit on August 9, 2019, the day before Epstein's death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate whose death on August 10, 2019, at the MCC New York is the subject of the OIG investigation. He was previously housed at MCC New York under Register Number 76318-054.

persons.name: Leonardo Fernandez
persons.context: Mentioned as an inmate for whom an Inmate Quarters History document is attached to the report. No further context provided in the excerpt.

events.title: OIG Interview of BOP Senior Officer
events.description: Senior Special Agent(s) from the DOJ Office of the Inspector General conducted a voluntary interview of a Senior Officer from the BOP's Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York regarding the death of Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Jeffrey Epstein Found Unresponsive
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was found unresponsive within his cell at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York.

events.title: Officer's Assignment Before Epstein's Death
events.description: The interviewed BOP Senior Officer was assigned to the MCC New York Special Housing Unit, where Epstein was housed, the day before Epstein was found dead.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, New York
MCC New York Special Housing Unit
keyFacts: The DOJ Office of the Inspector General (OIG) conducted an interview on August 5, 2021, with a BOP Senior Officer as part of its investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death.
Jeffrey Epstein (Register Number 76318-054) was found unresponsive in his cell at the MCC New York on August 10, 2019.
The interviewed officer was assigned to the MCC New York Special Housing Unit on August 9, 2019, the day before Epstein's death.
The memorandum lists 14 attachments, including interview transcripts, assignment rosters, activity reports, and internal memos and emails from around the time of Epstein's death.
